channel.title: Signoz
channel.description: Signoz is a blog about open telementry.

item.title: Monitoring OpenMetrics for Gunicorn and Django application in Prometheus
item.description: In this blog, let's see how to set up Prometheus and Grafana in EKS and how to monitor Python based applications using Prometheus.
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: Monitoring Tools: Comparing Instana and Sysdig
item.description: In this blog, we compare Instana and Sysdig - two popular monitoring tools which claim to show APM metrics without need to instrument code.
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: The Time Machine
item.description: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...
item.author: undefined (undefined)
